text: Legends of Tomorrow is an American action-adventure television series developed by Greg Berlanti, Marc Guggenheim, Andrew Kreisberg and Phil Klemmer, who are also executive producers along with Sarah Schechter and Chris Fedak; Klemmer serves as showrunner. The series airs on The CW and is a spin- off from Arrow and The Flash, existing in the same fictional universe. On January 7, 2020, the series was renewed for a sixth season, which is set to premiere in midseason 2021. ==Series overview== == Episodes == === Season 1 (2016) === === Season 2 (2016–17) === === Season 3 (2017–18) === === Season 4 (2018–19) === === Season 5 (2020)=== === Season 6 (2021)=== == Ratings == ==Notes== ==References== Episodes Category:Lists of American action television series episodes Category:Lists of American science fiction television series episodes Category:Lists of Arrowverse episodes
